attributes.action: Trigger a General Election now that a second PM has resigned in this Tory party.
attributes.additional_details: We can’t allow this Government to continue to keep picking their leaders with mandates that we’re not approved by the people. The party has no unity and the public have lost faith, allow the people to set things right and have their say.
attributes.background: I want the Government to allow the public to have a say on who leads this country forward. We can’t be led by a leader who couldn’t beat Truss in the first place.
